amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 439 which prohibits use of funds to implement, administer, or enforce the final rule entitled "Hydraulic Fracturing on Federal and Indian Lands" as published in the Federal Register.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 13 printed in the Congressional Record to strike section 439 from the bill which provides for prohibitions regarding hydraulic fracturing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 250 (Roll no. 402).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Lawrence amendment (A046) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 250 (Roll no. 402).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A046) offered by Mrs. Lawrence.
